mapper.select: SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, ec.price, et.name as teacherName, es1.title AS subjectFirst, es2.title AS subjectSecond FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id WHERE ec.id = #{id} and ec.is_deleted = 0

SELECT ec.id, ec.title, ec.price, ec.lesson_num, ec.cover, ec.buy_count, ec.view_count, ec.subject_parent_id, ec.subject_id, ecd.description, et.id AS teacherId, et.name AS teacherName, et.intro, et.avatar, es1.title AS subjectTitle, es2.title AS subjectParentTitle FROM edu_course ec LEFT JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id = et.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_id = es1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ecd.id = ec.id WHERE ec.id = #{courseId} and ec.is_deleted = 0
